resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of dedicated Oracle and MySQL database administrators for migration tasks
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Risk of data integrity issues and extended downtime during database migrations

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Insufficient security resources during critical migration phases (only 50% allocation in Feb-Mar)
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Security vulnerabilities may be introduced during migration, risking compliance violations
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Current Resource Allocation Matrix: SS001 allocation

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Missing specialized tools for Oracle and MySQL database migrations
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Manual migration processes will increase risk and duration of database migrations

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated resources for large dataset migrations (205TB total data)
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Extended downtime and potential data loss during large-scale data transfers

resource_gap_analysis.resource_type: Cloud Cost Management and Optimization Tool
resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No dedicated tool for monitoring and optimizing cloud costs
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Risk of budget overruns due to unmonitored cloud resource consumption

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with Oracle migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required for Oracle database migrations in Q2 per migration schedule
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Leverage existing staff with additional training instead of new hires

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Security Specialist with cloud security certification
resource_recommendations.justification: Critical for security controls implementation during Q2 migrations
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Utilize cross-functional team members instead of specialized roles

resource_recommendations.justification: Required for efficient Oracle and MySQL database migrations
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Data Migration Specialist with large dataset experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Critical for migrating 205TB of data with minimal downtime
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement phased approach instead of parallel migrations

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Cloud Cost Management and Optimization Tool
resource_recommendations.justification: Essential for maintaining cloud costs within budget constraints

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement reserved instances for predictable workloads
